verses.text_plain: After these things, when the wrath of king Ahasuerus was appeased, he remembered Vashti, and what she had done, and what was decreed against her.
verses.verse_html: 1After these things, when the wrath of king Ahasuerus was appeased, he remembered Vashti, and what she had done, and what was decreed against her.

verses.text_plain: Then said the king’s servants that ministered unto him, Let there be fair young virgins sought for the king:
verses.verse_html: 2Then said the king’s servants that ministered unto him, Let there be fair young virgins sought for the king:

tokens.text: unto him, Let there be fair

verses.text_plain: And let the king appoint officers in all the provinces of his kingdom, that they may gather together all the fair young virgins unto Shushan the palace, to the house of the women, unto the custody of Hege the king’s chamberlain, keeper of the women; and let their things for purification be given them:
verses.verse_html:
3And let the king appoint officers in all the provinces of his kingdom, that they may gather together all the fair young virgins unto Shushan the palace, to the house of the women, unto the custody of Hege the king’s chamberlain, keeper of the women; and let their things for purification be given them: ▼
▼ unto the…: Heb. unto the hand
 , ▼
▼ Hege: also called, Hegai

tokens.text: and let their things for purification

footnotes.body_text: ▼ unto the…: Heb. unto the hand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ unto the…: Heb. unto the hand
▼ Hege: also called, Hegai

verses.text_plain: And let the maiden which pleaseth the king be queen instead of Vashti. And the thing pleased the king; and he did so.
verses.verse_html: 4And let the maiden which pleaseth the king be queen instead of Vashti. And the thing pleased the king; and he did so.

verses.text_plain: Now in Shushan the palace there was a certain Jew, whose name was Mordecai, the son of Jair, the son of Shimei, the son of Kish, a Benjamite;
verses.verse_html: 5Now in Shushan the palace there was a certain Jew, whose name was Mordecai, the son of Jair, the son of Shimei, the son of Kish, a Benjamite;

verses.text_plain: Who had been carried away from Jerusalem with the captivity which had been carried away with Jeconiah king of Judah, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried away.
verses.verse_html:
6Who had been carried away from Jerusalem with the captivity which had been carried away with Jeconiah king of Judah, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried away. ▼
▼ Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin

verses.text_plain: And he brought up Hadassah, that is, Esther, his uncle’s daughter: for she had neither father nor mother, and the maid was fair and beautiful; whom Mordecai, when her father and mother were dead, took for his own daughter.
verses.verse_html:
7And he brought up Hadassah, that is, Esther, his uncle’s daughter: for she had neither father nor mother, and the maid was fair and beautiful; whom Mordecai, when her father and mother were dead, took for his own daughter. ▼
▼ brought…: Heb. nourished
 , ▼
▼ fair…: Heb. fair of form, and good of countenance

footnotes.body_text: ▼ fair…: Heb. fair of form, and good of countenance
footnotes.body_html: ▼ fair…: Heb. fair of form, and good of countenance

verses.text_plain: So it came to pass, when the king’s commandment and his decree was heard, and when many maidens were gathered together unto Shushan the palace, to the custody of Hegai, that Esther was brought also unto the king’s house, to the custody of Hegai, keeper of the women.
verses.verse_html: 8So it came to pass, when the king’s commandment and his decree was heard, and when many maidens were gathered together unto Shushan the palace, to the custody of Hegai, that Esther was brought also unto the king’s house, to the custody of Hegai, keeper of the women.

tokens.text: So it came to pass, when the king’s

verses.text_plain: And the maiden pleased him, and she obtained kindness of him; and he speedily gave her her things for purification, with such things as belonged to her, and seven maidens, which were meet to be given her, out of the king’s house: and he preferred her and her maids unto the best place of the house of the women.
verses.verse_html:
9And the maiden pleased him, and she obtained kindness of him; and he speedily gave her her things for purification, with such things as belonged to her, and seven maidens, which were meet to be given her, out of the king’s house: and he preferred her and her maids unto the best place of the house of the women. ▼
▼ such…: Heb. her portions
 , ▼
▼ preferred: Heb. changed

footnotes.body_html: ▼ such…: Heb. her portions

verses.text_plain: Esther had not shewed her people nor her kindred: for Mordecai had charged her that she should not shew it.
verses.verse_html: 10Esther had not shewed her people nor her kindred: for Mordecai had charged her that she should not shew it.

tokens.text: her that she should not shew

verses.text_plain: And Mordecai walked every day before the court of the women’s house, to know how Esther did, and what should become of her.
verses.verse_html:
11And Mordecai walked every day before the court of the women’s house, to know how Esther did, and what should become of her. ▼
▼ to know…: Heb. to know the peace

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to know…: Heb. to know the peace
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to know…: Heb. to know the peace

verses.text_plain: Now when every maid’s turn was come to go in to king Ahasuerus, after that she had been twelve months, according to the manner of the women, (for so were the days of their purifications accomplished, to wit, six months with oil of myrrh, and six months with sweet odours, and with other things for the purifying of the women;)
verses.verse_html: 12Now when every maid’s turn was come to go in to king Ahasuerus, after that she had been twelve months, according to the manner of the women, (for so were the days of their purifications accomplished, to wit, six months with oil of myrrh, and six months with sweet odours, and with other things for the purifying of the women;)

verses.text_plain: Then thus came every maiden unto the king; whatsoever she desired was given her to go with her out of the house of the women unto the king’s house.
verses.verse_html: 13Then thus came every maiden unto the king; whatsoever she desired was given her to go with her out of the house of the women unto the king’s house.

tokens.text: with her out of the house

verses.text_plain: In the evening she went, and on the morrow she returned into the second house of the women, to the custody of Shaashgaz, the king’s chamberlain, which kept the concubines: she came in unto the king no more, except the king delighted in her, and that she were called by name.
verses.verse_html: 14In the evening she went, and on the morrow she returned into the second house of the women, to the custody of Shaashgaz, the king’s chamberlain, which kept the concubines: she came in unto the king no more, except the king delighted in her, and that she were called by name.

tokens.text: in her, and that she were called

verses.text_plain: Now when the turn of Esther, the daughter of Abihail the uncle of Mordecai, who had taken her for his daughter, was come to go in unto the king, she required nothing but what Hegai the king’s chamberlain, the keeper of the women, appointed. And Esther obtained favour in the sight of all them that looked upon her.
verses.verse_html: 15Now when the turn of Esther, the daughter of Abihail the uncle of Mordecai, who had taken her for his daughter, was come to go in unto the king, she required nothing but what Hegai the king’s chamberlain, the keeper of the women, appointed. And Esther obtained favour in the sight of all them that looked upon her.

verses.text_plain: So Esther was taken unto king Ahasuerus into his house royal in the tenth month, which is the month Tebeth, in the seventh year of his reign.
verses.verse_html: 16So Esther was taken unto king Ahasuerus into his house royal in the tenth month, which is the month Tebeth, in the seventh year of his reign.

verses.text_plain: And the king loved Esther above all the women, and she obtained grace and favour in his sight more than all the virgins; so that he set the royal crown upon her head, and made her queen instead of Vashti.
verses.verse_html:
17And the king loved Esther above all the women, and she obtained grace and favour in his sight more than all the virgins; so that he set the royal crown upon her head, and made her queen instead of Vashti. ▼
▼ favour: or, kindness
 , ▼
▼ in his…: Heb. before him

footnotes.body_html: ▼ in his…: Heb. before him

verses.text_plain: Then the king made a great feast unto all his princes and his servants, even Esther’s feast; and he made a release to the provinces, and gave gifts, according to the state of the king.
verses.verse_html:
18Then the king made a great feast unto all his princes and his servants, even Esther’s feast; and he made a release to the provinces, and gave gifts, according to the state of the king. ▼
▼ release: Heb. rest

verses.text_plain: And when the virgins were gathered together the second time, then Mordecai sat in the king’s gate.
verses.verse_html: 19And when the virgins were gathered together the second time, then Mordecai sat in the king’s gate.

verses.text_plain: Esther had not yet shewed her kindred nor her people; as Mordecai had charged her: for Esther did the commandment of Mordecai, like as when she was brought up with him.
verses.verse_html: 20Esther had not yet shewed her kindred nor her people; as Mordecai had charged her: for Esther did the commandment of Mordecai, like as when she was brought up with him.

tokens.text: like as when she was brought up

verses.text_plain: In those days, while Mordecai sat in the king’s gate, two of the king’s chamberlains, Bigthan and Teresh, of those which kept the door, were wroth, and sought to lay hand on the king Ahasuerus.
verses.verse_html:
21In those days, while Mordecai sat in the king’s gate, two of the king’s chamberlains, Bigthan and Teresh, of those which kept the door, were wroth, and sought to lay hand on the king Ahasuerus. ▼
▼ Bigthan: also called, Bigthana
 , ▼
▼ the door: Heb. the threshold

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Bigthan: also called, Bigthana
▼ the door: Heb. the threshold

verses.text_plain: And the thing was known to Mordecai, who told it unto Esther the queen; and Esther certified the king thereof in Mordecai’s name.
verses.verse_html: 22And the thing was known to Mordecai, who told it unto Esther the queen; and Esther certified the king thereof in Mordecai’s name.

verses.text_plain: And when inquisition was made of the matter, it was found out; therefore they were both hanged on a tree: and it was written in the book of the chronicles before the king.
verses.verse_html: 23And when inquisition was made of the matter, it was found out; therefore they were both hanged on a tree: and it was written in the book of the chronicles before the king.
